name: Ditto
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis Gene
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, it can use the attacks of your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Stick On
attacks.effect: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.
